sourcesContent:
import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import { Form, Button } from 'react-bootstrap' function Update() { const [id, setId] = useState("") const [name, setName] = useState("") const [email, setEmail] = useState(""); useEffect(() => { setId(localStorage.getItem('ID')) setName(localStorage.getItem('Name')) setEmail(localStorage.getItem('Email')) },[]) return (
ID: setId(e.target.value)} /> Name: setName(e.target.value)} /> Email address setEmail(e.target.value)} />
) } export default Update
